column1: Data Supplied By: National Livestock Reporting Service
Data source: National Livestock Reporting Service
Please see terms of use here: https://www.mla.com.au/general/Terms-and-conditions/data-and-information/

There was another small yarding of 46 cattle with quality mixed. The few yearlings sold to strong competition with steers making 316c to 328c and heifers 300c to 320c.
The few grown steers made 258c to 308c while heavy beef cows made 180c to 258c and leaner 116c to 146c/kg live.

Market Reporter Richard Bailey
